Articles.Content:
Hello kerbals! after exploring all of the kerbal solar system, the kerbals couldn't decide who should own what, and WAR BROKE OUT (DUN DUN DUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUN) between the Kerbal Alliance (me) and....ummm......thats the problem we have no one to fight if u want to engage in space warfare comment below or send me a pm!

fyi i didnt make this, i just think its so badass

RULES

1. a ship can do one "thing" per turn, but u can control other ships i.e one ship can blow up a space ship,other could change its orbit ect

*building a ship and putting it into a orbit(but not to a moon or planet) is 1 turn

*rendezvous with a ship and docking/attacking it is a turn

*extending or descending a orbit(and if wanted make it circle) is a turn

*changing to a other planet/moons orbit(properly not just intercepting i.e so you can get a proper orbit) is a turn

*landing is a turn

2. if your attacking a ship you can use 1 shot

3. cant edit other players ships, or control them (cmon be fair )

4. must name ship with empire name at front, feel free to be creative( something normal though, so dont call it D**k or something)

5. dont import ships, make them ur self

(if you dont understand any rules just ask)

(if you want to suggest any rules just ask)

IF U WANT TO USE MODS ASK (im using editor extensions http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/editor-extensions/ and http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kerbal-alarm-clock-2/ if u want to use a mod like kethane or b9 or anything ask me, other than that no mods!)

Please feel free to ask any questions

Edited October 6, 2013 by littlecheese999

This thread has been going for a while and sounds like just what you are looking for.

"Against what? You can't see any enemies!"
